entry.title: Easter Chick Broken China Porcelain Charm Includes Necklace - One of a Kind!
entry.summary:
Vendor: 34Roses
Type: Broken China charms and Jewelry
Price: 56.99

Easter Chick Broken China Porcelain Charm and with Necklace is made Vintage China with a Sweet Fluffy Easter Chick. Includes a 30" ball chain necklace. A custom made frame surrounds this vintage piece of china with small signature scallops. A soft pink crystal dangles at the bottom. Measures 1 1/4" x 2"(not counting crystal).

entry.title: Rare One of Kind Broken China Pink and Yellow Roses Sterling Silver Rolo Bracelet with Pink Depression Heart Shaped Glass Charms
entry.summary:
Vendor: China Baroque
Type: Broken China charms and Jewelry
Price: 239.99

Our Rare One of Kind Sterling Silver Broken China Pink and Yellow Roses Rolo Bracelet has Pink Depression Heart Shaped Glass Charms. Our broken china jewelry is made from vintage china refurbished into works of art. This huge statement piece is sure be to added to that special section of your jewelry box. The china charm and Depression glass charms are encased in beautiful high-quality silver jewelry. Both bracelet and charms are over 90% pure silver.  Be sure to pay attention to the lovely pale pink lampwork glass roses and sparkling swarovski crystal accents. Ladies treat yourself!  Men surprise her with rare jewelry she'll love!

entry.title: Pink Rose on Blue Stripe Silver Spoon Bracelet with Vintage Broken China Porcelain Heart Shaped Charm
entry.summary:
Vendor: vintage revival
Type: Silver Spoon China Charm Bracelets
Price: 103.99

Pink Rose on Blue Stripe Silver Spoon Bracelet has crystals and Broken China Jewelry Charm in Sterling Setting includes Gift Box. This USA Handcrafted bracelet is made from pieces of broken china and a vintage silver plate spoon. Each china piece is artfully cut and set in sterling silver to create a one-of-a-kind jewelry art masterpiece you'll love to wear. Crystal beads accent the colors of the china. This is a one of a kind piece!

entry.title: Blue Roses with Broken China Hearts and Pearls Bracelet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brambleberry
Type: Broken China charms and Jewelry
Price: 139.99

Broken China Bracelet - Polymer Clay Flowers - China Heart Charms - Charm Bracelet - Broken China Charm Bracelet

Polymer clay, handmade roses are on this stunning handmade bracelet with three broken china heart charms. Everything on this broken china bracelet has been hand made except the glass pearl beads. 

This broken china and porcelain clay charm bracelet was 100 % crafted by me. The heart charms were cut from a vintage china plate. It is then soldered a bezel around it with lead free, silver based solder. The colors shades of blue from light to dark. The colors were mixed to match the flowers on the broken china charm. The flowers are roses and forget-me-knots.

The porcelain clay flowers and leaves were handmade for cold porcelain clay. Two coats of sealer was used on them. They are extremely strong and durable.They were attached to the bracelet with jump rings that have been soldered closed and have soldered all the jump rings closed.

This is an extremely labor intense procedure and it takes several days to complete one like this. Ninety percent of the attachments have been wire wrapped. 

The closure is a round silver plate toggle clasp. This bracelet measures 7 1/2".

entry.title: Pink Roses Broken China Heart and Pearl Bracelet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Brambleberry
Type: Broken China charms and Jewelry
Price: 139.99

This amazing bracelet has sold out but please check here for our latest Broken China Bracelets.

This amazing one-of-a-king bracelet features:

3 Broken China Heart Charms (Vintage Plate)
2 10mm handmade lampwork beads (base mauve, tiny flowers)
2 Rosebud handmade lampwork beads (large)
24 Hand wrapped 8mm pearl glass beads 9 (white, light pink and fushia)
1 Light pink focal bead
2 Sets of three wire wrapped dangles (various beads)

The three 1" x 1"  pink rose broken china hearts were cut from a vintage china plate.

This bracelet measures approximately 7 3/4" including a toggle clasp.

All the findings are silver plate and can be polished with a good silver polish including the bezels around the broken china charms. All the jump rings on this broken china charm bracelet have been soldered closed.
